message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is valued at $120. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $110. Please let me know if this meets your expectations.
Thank you for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate the price point, but I'm looking to stay closer to $100. I'm willing to pay $105.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet within your budget. I'd like to offer you the product at $107, which I believe is a fair compromise considering the value it provides. Please let me know if this offer suits your needs.
